mapper.sql: BLLK_CUST_HST_SEQ /*주의고객이력일련번호 */ , ITG_CUST_NO /*통합고객번호 */ , BLLK_REG_WHY_CD /*주의고객등록사유코드 공통코드 : CU320 [001 : 구매취소 2회 이상 , 002 : 상습컴플레인 3회 이상 , 003 : 폭언 및 욕설 2회 이상 , 999 : 기타]*/ , BLLK_REG_WHY_CTNTS /*주의고객등록사유내용 */ , STOR_NO /*매장번호 */ , DEL_YN /*삭제여부 */ , AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , AMD_DT /*수정일시 */ , REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , REG_CHL_CD /*등록채널코드 공통코드 : S000 [CRM : CRM , CTC : 상담 , AS : AS , SAP : SAP]*/

A.BLLK_CUST_HST_SEQ /*주의고객이력일련번호 */ , A.ITG_CUST_NO /*통합고객번호 */ , A.BLLK_REG_WHY_CD /*주의고객등록사유코드 공통코드 : CU320 [001 : 구매취소 2회 이상 , 002 : 상습컴플레인 3회 이상 , 003 : 폭언 및 욕설 2회 이상 , 999 : 기타]*/ , A.BLLK_REG_WHY_CTNTS /*주의고객등록사유내용 */ , A.STOR_NO /*매장번호 */ , A.DEL_YN /*삭제여부 */ , A.AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , TO_CHAR(A.AMD_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AMD_DT /*수정일시 */ , A.REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , A.REG_CHL_CD /*등록채널코드 공통코드 : S000 [CRM : CRM , CTC : 상담 , AS : AS , SAP : SAP]*/ , (SELECT STOR_NM FROM CRM_STOR_BAS WHERE STOR_NO = A.STOR_NO AND ROWNUM = 1) STOR_NO_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'CU320' AND COMN_CD = A.BLLK_REG_WHY_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) BLLK_REG_WHY_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD = A.REG_CHL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) REG_CHL_CD_NM
mapper.select:
SELECT /* com.ceragem.api.crm.dao.CrmBllkCustHstDao.selectList */ , B.CORP_DIV_YN /*법인구분여부 */ , B.CUST_NM /*고객명 */ , B.GNDR_CD /*성별코드 */ , B.BIRTHDAY /*생년월일 */ , B.BIZ_NO /*사업자등록번호 */ , B.CORP_REG_NO /*법인등록번호 */ , B.CORP_TEL_NO /*법인전화번호 */ , B.FORN_YN /*외국인여부 */ , B.REP_NM /*대표명 */ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',B.MPHON_NO,'') MPHON_NO /*이동전화번호암호화값 */ , B.MPHON_BK_DGT_NO /*이동전화뒤자리번호 */ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',B.EMAIL_ADDR,'') EMAIL_ADDR /*이메일주소 */ , B.PIC_NM /*담당자명 */ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',B.PIC_MPHON_NO,'') PIC_MPHON_NO /*담당자이동전화번호 */ , B.PIC_MPHON_BK_DGT_NO /*담당자이동전화뒤자리번호 */ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',B.PIC_EMAIL_ADDR,'') PIC_EMAIL_ADDR /*담당자이메일주소 */ , TO_CHAR(B.INDI_INFO_VALID_PERD_STA_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') INDI_INFO_VALID_PERD_STA_DT /*개인정보유효기간시작일시 */ , TO_CHAR(B.INDI_INFO_VALID_PERD_END_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') INDI_INFO_VALID_PERD_END_DT /*개인정보유효기간종료일시 */ , B.CUST_STATUS_CD /*고객상태코드 */ , TO_CHAR(B.CUST_STATUS_CHNG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') CUST_STATUS_CHNG_DT /*고객상태변경일시 */ , TO_CHAR(B.CUST_INFO_CHNG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') CUST_INFO_CHNG_DT /*고객정보변경일시 */ , B.CUST_TYPE_CD /*고객유형코드 */ , B.CUST_DIV_CD /*고객구분코드 */ , B.ZIP_CD /*우편번호 */ , B.ADDR_1_CTNTS /*주소1내용 */ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',B.ADDR_2_CTNTS,'') ADDR_2_CTNTS /*주소2내용 */ , B.RCMD_STOR_NO /*추천매장번호 */ , B.RCMDR_CUST_NO /*추천인고객번호 */ , B.RCMD_EXECVDEMP_NO /*추천임직원번호 */ , B.MARRY_YN /*결혼여부 */ , B.REP_HSHLD_NO /*대표가구번호 */ , B.FAMLY_REL_CD /*가족관계코드 */ , B.DWEL_NFPY_CD /*주거평수코드 */ , B.INTRST_FILD_CD /*관심분야코드 */ , B.REP_GODS_NO /*대표제품번호 */ , B.REP_USE_CUST_DIV_CD /*대표사용고객구분코드 */ , B.SMS_RCV_AGREE_YN /*SMS수신동의여부 */ , TO_CHAR(B.SMS_RCV_AGREE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') SMS_RCV_AGREE_DT /*SMS수신동의일시 */ , B.SMS_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD /*SMS수신동의채널코드 */ , B.EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_YN /*이메일수신동의여부 */ , TO_CHAR(B.EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_DT /*이메일수신동의일시 */ , B.EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD /*이메일수신동의채널코드 */ , B.ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_YN /*알람톡수신동의여부 */ , TO_CHAR(B.ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_DT /*알람톡수신동의일시 */ , B.ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD /*알람톡수신동의채널코드 */ , B.PUSH_RCV_AGREE_YN /*PUSH수신동의여부 */ , TO_CHAR(B.PUSH_RCV_AGREE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') PUSH_RCV_AGREE_DT /*PUSH수신동의일시 */ , B.PUSH_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD /*PUSH수신동의채널코드 */ , B.CI_CERTF_YN /*CI인증여부 */ , B.CI /*CI */ , B.DI_CERTF_YN /*DI인증여부 */ , B.DI /*DI */ , B.RCV_RFSL_YN /*수신거부여부 */ , B.MSHIP_SBSC_YN /*멤버십가입여부 */ , B.MSHIP_LOGIN_ID /*멤버십로그인ID */ , B.MSHIP_SBT_NO /*멤버십대체번호 */ , B.MSHIP_LOGIN_PWD /*멤버십로그인비밀번호 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_LAST_LOGIN_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_LAST_LOGIN_DT /*멤버십최종로그인일시 */ , B.MSHIP_LAST_LOGIN_IP_ADDR /*멤버십최종로그인IP주소 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_LAST_STOR_VISIT_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_LAST_STOR_VISIT_DT /*멤버십최종매장방문일시 */ , B.MSHIP_LAST_VISIT_STOR_NO /*멤버십최종방문매장번호 */ , B.MSHIP_TYPE_CD /*멤버십유형코드 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_SBSC_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_SBSC_DT /*멤버십가입일시 */ , B.MSHIP_GRADE_CD /*멤버십등급코드 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_GRADE_CHNG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_GRADE_CHNG_DT /*멤버십등급변경일시 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_INFO_CHNG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_INFO_CHNG_DT /*멤버십정보변경일시 */ , B.MSHIP_INFO_CONFR_EXECVDEMP_NO /*멤버십정보확인자임직원번호 */ , B.CPRT_EXECVDEMP_NO /*제휴임직원번호 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_LEAVE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_LEAVE_DT /*멤버십탈퇴일시 */ , B.EXTNC_POINT_LMT_SCORE /*소멸포인트한도점수 */ , B.ACCUM_POINT_LMT_SCORE /*적립포인트한도점수 */ , B.REMAIN_POINT_SCORE /*잔여포인트점수 */ , B.MSHIP_CHL_CD /*멤버십채널코드 */ , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'CU030' AND COMN_CD = B.CUST_TYPE_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) CUST_TYPE_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'CU010' AND COMN_CD = B.CUST_DIV_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) CUST_DIV_CD_NM , (SELECT STOR_NM FROM CRM_STOR_BAS WHERE STOR_NO = B.RCMD_STOR_NO AND ROWNUM = 1) RCMD_STOR_NO_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'CU040' AND COMN_CD = B.FAMLY_REL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) FAMLY_REL_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'CU050' AND COMN_CD = B.DWEL_NFPY_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) DWEL_NFPY_CD_NM
, (SELECT GODS_NM FROM CRM_GODS_BAS WHERE GODS_NO = B.REP_GODS_NO ) REP_GODS_NO_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'CU060' AND COMN_CD = B.REP_USE_CUST_DIV_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) REP_USE_CUST_DIV_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD = B.SMS_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) SMS_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD = B.EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD = B.ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD = B.PUSH_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) PUSH_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD_NM , (SELECT STOR_NM FROM CRM_STOR_BAS WHERE STOR_NO = B.MSHIP_LAST_VISIT_STOR_NO AND ROWNUM = 1) MSHIP_LAST_VISIT_STOR_NO_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'MB010' AND COMN_CD = B.MSHIP_TYPE_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) MSHIP_TYPE_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'MB020' AND COMN_CD = B.MSHIP_GRADE_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) MSHIP_GRADE_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD = B.MSHIP_CHL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) MSHIP_CHL_CD_NM , (SELECT STOR_NM FROM CRM_STOR_BAS WHERE STOR_NO = B.BLLK_REG_STOR_NO AND ROWNUM = 1) BLLK_REG_STOR_NO_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD = B.BLLK_REG_CHL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) BLLK_REG_CHL_CD_NM FROM CRM_BLLK_CUST_HST A INNER JOIN CRM_CUST_BAS B ON A.ITG_CUST_NO = B.ITG_CUST_NO
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC

SELECT /* com.ceragem.api.crm.dao.CrmBllkCustHstDao.select */ , B.CORP_DIV_YN /*법인구분여부 */ , B.CUST_NM /*고객명 */ , B.GNDR_CD /*성별코드 */ , B.BIRTHDAY /*생년월일 */ , B.BIZ_NO /*사업자등록번호 */ , B.CORP_REG_NO /*법인등록번호 */ , B.CORP_TEL_NO /*법인전화번호 */ , B.FORN_YN /*외국인여부 */ , B.REP_NM /*대표명 */ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',B.MPHON_NO,'') MPHON_NO /*이동전화번호암호화값 */ , B.MPHON_BK_DGT_NO /*이동전화뒤자리번호 */ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',B.EMAIL_ADDR,'') EMAIL_ADDR /*이메일주소 */ , B.PIC_NM /*담당자명 */ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',B.PIC_MPHON_NO,'') PIC_MPHON_NO /*담당자이동전화번호 */ , B.PIC_MPHON_BK_DGT_NO /*담당자이동전화뒤자리번호 */ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',B.PIC_EMAIL_ADDR,'') PIC_EMAIL_ADDR /*담당자이메일주소 */ , TO_CHAR(B.INDI_INFO_VALID_PERD_STA_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') INDI_INFO_VALID_PERD_STA_DT /*개인정보유효기간시작일시 */ , TO_CHAR(B.INDI_INFO_VALID_PERD_END_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') INDI_INFO_VALID_PERD_END_DT /*개인정보유효기간종료일시 */ , B.CUST_STATUS_CD /*고객상태코드 */ , TO_CHAR(B.CUST_STATUS_CHNG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') CUST_STATUS_CHNG_DT /*고객상태변경일시 */ , TO_CHAR(B.CUST_INFO_CHNG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') CUST_INFO_CHNG_DT /*고객정보변경일시 */ , B.CUST_TYPE_CD /*고객유형코드 */ , B.CUST_DIV_CD /*고객구분코드 */ , B.ZIP_CD /*우편번호 */ , B.ADDR_1_CTNTS /*주소1내용 */ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',B.ADDR_2_CTNTS,'') ADDR_2_CTNTS /*주소2내용 */ , B.RCMD_STOR_NO /*추천매장번호 */ , B.RCMDR_CUST_NO /*추천인고객번호 */ , B.RCMD_EXECVDEMP_NO /*추천임직원번호 */ , B.MARRY_YN /*결혼여부 */ , B.REP_HSHLD_NO /*대표가구번호 */ , B.FAMLY_REL_CD /*가족관계코드 */ , B.DWEL_NFPY_CD /*주거평수코드 */ , B.INTRST_FILD_CD /*관심분야코드 */ , B.REP_GODS_NO /*대표제품번호 */ , B.REP_USE_CUST_DIV_CD /*대표사용고객구분코드 */ , B.SMS_RCV_AGREE_YN /*SMS수신동의여부 */ , TO_CHAR(B.SMS_RCV_AGREE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') SMS_RCV_AGREE_DT /*SMS수신동의일시 */ , B.SMS_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD /*SMS수신동의채널코드 */ , B.EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_YN /*이메일수신동의여부 */ , TO_CHAR(B.EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_DT /*이메일수신동의일시 */ , B.EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD /*이메일수신동의채널코드 */ , B.ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_YN /*알람톡수신동의여부 */ , TO_CHAR(B.ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_DT /*알람톡수신동의일시 */ , B.ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD /*알람톡수신동의채널코드 */ , B.PUSH_RCV_AGREE_YN /*PUSH수신동의여부 */ , TO_CHAR(B.PUSH_RCV_AGREE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') PUSH_RCV_AGREE_DT /*PUSH수신동의일시 */ , B.PUSH_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD /*PUSH수신동의채널코드 */ , B.CI_CERTF_YN /*CI인증여부 */ , B.CI /*CI */ , B.DI_CERTF_YN /*DI인증여부 */ , B.DI /*DI */ , B.RCV_RFSL_YN /*수신거부여부 */ , B.MSHIP_SBSC_YN /*멤버십가입여부 */ , B.MSHIP_LOGIN_ID /*멤버십로그인ID */ , B.MSHIP_SBT_NO /*멤버십대체번호 */ , B.MSHIP_LOGIN_PWD /*멤버십로그인비밀번호 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_LAST_LOGIN_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_LAST_LOGIN_DT /*멤버십최종로그인일시 */ , B.MSHIP_LAST_LOGIN_IP_ADDR /*멤버십최종로그인IP주소 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_LAST_STOR_VISIT_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_LAST_STOR_VISIT_DT /*멤버십최종매장방문일시 */ , B.MSHIP_LAST_VISIT_STOR_NO /*멤버십최종방문매장번호 */ , B.MSHIP_TYPE_CD /*멤버십유형코드 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_SBSC_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_SBSC_DT /*멤버십가입일시 */ , B.MSHIP_GRADE_CD /*멤버십등급코드 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_GRADE_CHNG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_GRADE_CHNG_DT /*멤버십등급변경일시 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_INFO_CHNG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_INFO_CHNG_DT /*멤버십정보변경일시 */ , B.MSHIP_INFO_CONFR_EXECVDEMP_NO /*멤버십정보확인자임직원번호 */ , B.CPRT_EXECVDEMP_NO /*제휴임직원번호 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_LEAVE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_LEAVE_DT /*멤버십탈퇴일시 */ , B.EXTNC_POINT_LMT_SCORE /*소멸포인트한도점수 */ , B.ACCUM_POINT_LMT_SCORE /*적립포인트한도점수 */ , B.REMAIN_POINT_SCORE /*잔여포인트점수 */ , B.MSHIP_CHL_CD /*멤버십채널코드 */ , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'CU030' AND COMN_CD = B.CUST_TYPE_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) CUST_TYPE_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'CU010' AND COMN_CD = B.CUST_DIV_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) CUST_DIV_CD_NM , (SELECT STOR_NM FROM CRM_STOR_BAS WHERE STOR_NO = B.RCMD_STOR_NO AND ROWNUM = 1) RCMD_STOR_NO_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'CU040' AND COMN_CD = B.FAMLY_REL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) FAMLY_REL_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'CU050' AND COMN_CD = B.DWEL_NFPY_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) DWEL_NFPY_CD_NM
, (SELECT GODS_NM FROM CRM_GODS_BAS WHERE GODS_NO = B.REP_GODS_NO ) REP_GODS_NO_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'CU060' AND COMN_CD = B.REP_USE_CUST_DIV_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) REP_USE_CUST_DIV_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD = B.SMS_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) SMS_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD = B.EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD = B.ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD = B.PUSH_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) PUSH_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD_NM , (SELECT STOR_NM FROM CRM_STOR_BAS WHERE STOR_NO = B.MSHIP_LAST_VISIT_STOR_NO AND ROWNUM = 1) MSHIP_LAST_VISIT_STOR_NO_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'MB010' AND COMN_CD = B.MSHIP_TYPE_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) MSHIP_TYPE_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'MB020' AND COMN_CD = B.MSHIP_GRADE_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) MSHIP_GRADE_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD = B.MSHIP_CHL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) MSHIP_CHL_CD_NM , (SELECT STOR_NM FROM CRM_STOR_BAS WHERE STOR_NO = B.BLLK_REG_STOR_NO AND ROWNUM = 1) BLLK_REG_STOR_NO_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD = B.BLLK_REG_CHL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) BLLK_REG_CHL_CD_NM FROM CRM_BLLK_CUST_HST A INNER JOIN CRM_CUST_BAS B ON A.ITG_CUST_NO = B.ITG_CUST_NO

SELECT /* com.ceragem.api.crm.dao.CrmBllkCustHstDao.selectCustList */ A.* FROM ( SELECT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.REG_CHL_CD,A.STOR_NO ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC ) RNUM , B.CORP_DIV_YN /*법인구분여부 */ , B.CUST_NM /*고객명 */ , B.GNDR_CD /*성별코드 */ , B.BIRTHDAY /*생년월일 */ , B.BIZ_NO /*사업자등록번호 */ , B.CORP_REG_NO /*법인등록번호 */ , B.CORP_TEL_NO /*법인전화번호 */ , B.FORN_YN /*외국인여부 */ , B.REP_NM /*대표명 */ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',B.MPHON_NO,'') MPHON_NO /*이동전화번호암호화값 */ , B.MPHON_BK_DGT_NO /*이동전화뒤자리번호 */ , B.EMAIL_ADDR /*이메일주소 */ , B.PIC_NM /*담당자명 */ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',B.PIC_MPHON_NO,'') PIC_MPHON_NO /*담당자이동전화번호 */ , B.PIC_MPHON_BK_DGT_NO /*담당자이동전화뒤자리번호 */ , B.PIC_EMAIL_ADDR /*담당자이메일주소 */ , TO_CHAR(B.INDI_INFO_VALID_PERD_STA_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') INDI_INFO_VALID_PERD_STA_DT /*개인정보유효기간시작일시 */ , TO_CHAR(B.INDI_INFO_VALID_PERD_END_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') INDI_INFO_VALID_PERD_END_DT /*개인정보유효기간종료일시 */ , B.CUST_STATUS_CD /*고객상태코드 */ , TO_CHAR(B.CUST_STATUS_CHNG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') CUST_STATUS_CHNG_DT /*고객상태변경일시 */ , TO_CHAR(B.CUST_INFO_CHNG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') CUST_INFO_CHNG_DT /*고객정보변경일시 */ , B.CUST_TYPE_CD /*고객유형코드 */ , B.CUST_DIV_CD /*고객구분코드 */ , B.ZIP_CD /*우편번호 */ , B.ADDR_1_CTNTS /*주소1내용 */ , B.ADDR_2_CTNTS /*주소2내용 */ , B.RCMD_STOR_NO /*추천매장번호 */ , B.RCMDR_CUST_NO /*추천인고객번호 */ , B.RCMD_EXECVDEMP_NO /*추천임직원번호 */ , B.MARRY_YN /*결혼여부 */ , B.REP_HSHLD_NO /*대표가구번호 */ , B.FAMLY_REL_CD /*가족관계코드 */ , B.DWEL_NFPY_CD /*주거평수코드 */ , B.INTRST_FILD_CD /*관심분야코드 */ , B.REP_GODS_NO /*대표제품번호 */ , B.REP_USE_CUST_DIV_CD /*대표사용고객구분코드 */ , B.SMS_RCV_AGREE_YN /*SMS수신동의여부 */ , TO_CHAR(B.SMS_RCV_AGREE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') SMS_RCV_AGREE_DT /*SMS수신동의일시 */ , B.SMS_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD /*SMS수신동의채널코드 */ , B.EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_YN /*이메일수신동의여부 */ , TO_CHAR(B.EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_DT /*이메일수신동의일시 */ , B.EMAIL_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD /*이메일수신동의채널코드 */ , B.ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_YN /*알람톡수신동의여부 */ , TO_CHAR(B.ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_DT /*알람톡수신동의일시 */ , B.ALRM_TK_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD /*알람톡수신동의채널코드 */ , B.PUSH_RCV_AGREE_YN /*PUSH수신동의여부 */ , TO_CHAR(B.PUSH_RCV_AGREE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') PUSH_RCV_AGREE_DT /*PUSH수신동의일시 */ , B.PUSH_RCV_AGREE_CHL_CD /*PUSH수신동의채널코드 */ , B.CI_CERTF_YN /*CI인증여부 */ , B.CI /*CI */ , B.DI_CERTF_YN /*DI인증여부 */ , B.DI /*DI */ , B.RCV_RFSL_YN /*수신거부여부 */ , B.MSHIP_SBSC_YN /*멤버십가입여부 */ , B.MSHIP_LOGIN_ID /*멤버십로그인ID */ , B.MSHIP_SBT_NO /*멤버십대체번호 */ , B.MSHIP_LOGIN_PWD /*멤버십로그인비밀번호 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_LAST_LOGIN_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_LAST_LOGIN_DT /*멤버십최종로그인일시 */ , B.MSHIP_LAST_LOGIN_IP_ADDR /*멤버십최종로그인IP주소 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_LAST_STOR_VISIT_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_LAST_STOR_VISIT_DT /*멤버십최종매장방문일시 */ , B.MSHIP_LAST_VISIT_STOR_NO /*멤버십최종방문매장번호 */ , B.MSHIP_TYPE_CD /*멤버십유형코드 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_SBSC_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_SBSC_DT /*멤버십가입일시 */ , B.MSHIP_GRADE_CD /*멤버십등급코드 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_GRADE_CHNG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_GRADE_CHNG_DT /*멤버십등급변경일시 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_INFO_CHNG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_INFO_CHNG_DT /*멤버십정보변경일시 */ , B.MSHIP_INFO_CONFR_EXECVDEMP_NO /*멤버십정보확인자임직원번호 */ , B.CPRT_EXECVDEMP_NO /*제휴임직원번호 */ , TO_CHAR(B.MSHIP_LEAVE_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') MSHIP_LEAVE_DT /*멤버십탈퇴일시 */ , B.EXTNC_POINT_LMT_SCORE /*소멸포인트한도점수 */ , B.ACCUM_POINT_LMT_SCORE /*적립포인트한도점수 */ , B.REMAIN_POINT_SCORE /*잔여포인트점수 */ , B.MSHIP_CHL_CD /*멤버십채널코드 */ FROM CRM_BLLK_CUST_HST A INNER JOIN CRM_CUST_BAS B ON A.ITG_CUST_NO = B.ITG_CUST_NO WHERE A.ITG_CUST_NO = #{itgCustNo} ) A WHERE A.RNUM = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CRM_BLLK_CUST_HST /* com.ceragem.api.crm.dao.CrmBllkCustHstDao.updateDelete */ SET DEL_YN = 'Y' , AMDR_ID = #{amdrId} , AMD_DT = SYSDATE
